Vulnerabilities.Title: Nginx HTTP Request Smuggling
Vulnerabilities.Description: HTTP request smuggling vulnerability in nginx that allows attackers to bypass security controls and access restricted resources.

Vulnerabilities.Title: PCRE Regular Expression DoS
Vulnerabilities.Description: Denial of service vulnerability in PCRE library through specially crafted regular expressions that can cause excessive CPU consumption.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Zlib Compression Vulnerability
Vulnerabilities.Description: Vulnerability in zlib compression library that may lead to information disclosure through decompression attacks.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Bash Command Injection
Vulnerabilities.Description: Minor command injection vulnerability in bash that requires local access and specific conditions to exploit.
